txt.en: The scout has escaped...this does not bode well for the Rohirrim
The scout has escaped...this does not bode well for the Rohirrim
With Wynmar distracted by his admiration for Noriel, Rothulf is deeply concerned about the movements of Orcs on the fringes of the camp.

'Please, [placeholder], you must tell me more of Noriel. I would give anything to see her again. I have never seen a maiden so fair nor so bold.\n\n'Do you think her brethren would let me approach their keep again, so that I could speak with her one last time? I am loath to leave these woods!'
Rothulf stands near Wynmar at the southern Rohirrim camp.\n\nWynmar is distracted by his love for Noriel, but Rothulf has asked for a word with you.

'Wynmar has been like this ever since his first encounter with that woman. I think she has bewitched him!\n\n'He pays no mind to the strange sightings and sounds; I have a bad feeling, [placeholder]. I feel that we are being hunted as we move south....'
Rothulf suspects that a threatening presence can be found around Wynmar's camp in the south of Thinglad.\n\nYou should search for and defeat any threats to the Rohirrim hunters.
A hardy leader of the Orc-scouts' initiative is likely somewhere near Wynmar's camp.\n\nYou should try to defeat the scouts' leader before he can alert the attackers of the Rohirrim's whereabouts.
'Alas, alas! Why cannot our folk be friends?'
'Orc-scouts surrounded us? That is dire news -- and more dire that one escaped, and our leader is hopelessly bewitched. What are we to do?'
Rothulf is in Wynmar's camp in southern Thinglad.\n\nYou should return to Rothulf with the dire news of the escaped scout.
'Trying to stop us from spreading the word of your little camp, are you?\n\n'Cursed [placeholder], the Orcs will feast upon the flesh of Man tonight!'
Talk to Rothulf, who seems to have something important to tell you
Defeat any threats to the Rohirrim's camp ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Stop the scouts' leader from sounding the alert
Return to Rothulf with news of the Orc-threat
